name: SLOT (MarioBG3)
description:
You were playing at the slots in a bar, but a thief has stolen your wallet! What's more, he's sending in his buddies to stop you from getting it back. Will you be able to dodge them until you can get back what's yours?

We haven't been able to finish the project, sadly; organizational problems meant we were not able to finish the core loop of gameplay. If you want to have a look at what we have, however, there's enough that you can get an idea about what we intended!

CREDITS:

Shawn Madigan: programming, music and game design

Elena Molina: 2D art and sprite animations

Mario Bizcocho: programming, game design and level design
